summary: Digitized Skyrim is a texture overhaul, to make the game seem like a simulation. Not Lore friendly.
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------
News
--------------------------------
Uploaded some previews of the new armor and weapon style I'm working on. Nothing too fancy but might appeal to the tron crowd more. In general it helps armor and weapons stand out compared to the landscape but also fit with the digital style.

--------------------------------
Description
--------------------------------
Digitized Skyrim is a texture overhaul, to make the game seem like a simulation akin to the Matrix or maybe more accurately Tron. This is actually meant to be a serious mod, definitely not lore friendly. In fact part of the motivation for this was to easier explain all the mods one may have in their game. Though the main motivation has been to create a texture replacer that doesn't require a high end machine.

The textures are pretty much vanilla, except smaller file size and very tiny mipmaps. Basically you shouldn't lose performance at all, in fact it should increase performance. Although it's nothing more than a cheap and easy effect you can do in photoshop. I'm aiming for something that is at least partly module in terms of what is replaced.

--------------------------------
Notes
--------------------------------
-There is no LOD textures, so a suggested solution for now is to use the console command "tll" which disables LOD. Otherwise distant textures will still be normal ones.

-Might want to do something to decrease bloom, like using the teofis command or one of these mods:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31593/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53014/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12314/?

--------------------------------
Updates
--------------------------------
First upload:
Landscape and Armor

Update 1:
Creatures

Update 2:
Most Architecture and all Dungeon stuff

Update 3:
Plants
--------------------------------
Recommendations
--------------------------------
I recommend Floating Healthbars as it goes great with my mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58728/?

--------------------------------
Install
--------------------------------
Extract the Data folder inside the Rar archive to your Skyrim directory.

--------------------------------
Conflicts
--------------------------------
Other default texture replacers that replace the same things.
author: LordTerramine
